zh.title: “具身智能: 从科学走向产业的探索与创新”论坛举行，国创中心深化人工智能科技金融合作
zh.summary: 长三角国创中心与戈壁创投达成战略合作，将设立人工智能专项基金，计划3年内投资15-20个项目，构建"资金+场景+产业资源"支持体系，加速AI技术转化和商业化应用。

zh.title: 至格科技半年内再获亿元级融资，为清华孵化的AR眼镜光学厂商｜36氪首发
zh.summary: AR光学厂商至格科技完成亿元级融资，将用于产能扩充及产品迭代，其自主研发的衍射光波导技术已实现月产10万片规模，并推出"无彩虹纹"等创新方案提升用户体验。

zh.title: 自研生物结构预测基础模型，「探序秩元」试图打破新药研发双十定律 | 早期项目
zh.summary: 【AI驱动科研范式变革】国内初创公司探序秩元发布可控生物分子结构预测模型IntelliFold，在蛋白质-核酸相互作用预测等指标上媲美AlphaFold3，并实现RNA结构预测超越。该团队融合结构生物学与大模型技术，瞄准药物设计痛点，通过适配器技术实现别构预测等精准控制，已开放测试平台并规划商业化应用。

zh.title: 8点1氪｜官方通报女司机亮证逼迫让路事件；自动驾驶车祸致1死1伤，特斯拉被裁定赔偿2.43亿美元；库克成苹果史上任期最长CEO
zh.summary: 防城港通报"女司机亮证逼让路"事件：涉事女子非公职人员，其丈夫因违规保管执法证被立案调查，奔驰车为17.8万元二手购入。

zh.title: 让经期护理少一点噱头，护舒宝推出“物理隔菌”液体卫生巾｜最前线
zh.summary: 护舒宝在上海推出液体卫生巾Pro健康专研版，采用物理隔菌技术，强调不干扰阴道菌群平衡的科学护理理念，同时启动"女生守护计划"公益项目。

zh.title: 马斯克：研究者不存在了，只有工程师；LeCun：大错特错
zh.summary: 马斯克称"研究者已不存在只剩工程师"，遭Meta首席AI科学家LeCun强烈反驳，引发业界对科研与工程关系的热议。

zh.title: 全网苦等GPT-5，超级对齐团队遗作成重要线索，奥特曼发话「惊喜很多」
zh.summary: OpenAI CEO奥特曼暗示GPT-5将带来多项突破，超级对齐团队研究成果或成关键进展，引发业界高度期待。

zh.title: 图灵奖得主Sutton再突破：强化学习在控制问题上媲美深度强化学习？
zh.summary: 强化学习先驱Sutton团队新研究显示，传统强化学习在控制问题上性能接近深度强化学习，挑战了当前AI领域对深度学习的依赖。

zh.title: GUI定位还在玩「非黑即白」？浙大团队提出GUI-G²，显著提升GUI智能体定位性能
zh.summary: 浙大团队开发GUI-G²技术，突破传统黑白定位局限，显著提升图形界面智能体的定位精度。

zh.title: OpenAI IMO金牌团队爆料：AI拒绝作答第六题
zh.summary: OpenAI数学竞赛团队透露，其AI系统在国际数学奥赛模拟测试中拒绝回答第六题，引发对AI解题能力边界的讨论。

en.title: Brendan Carr declares victory over the First Amendment
en.summary: 新闻自由基金会起诉FCC主席卡雷涉嫌滥用职权控制媒体，指控其违反律师职业操守。

en.title: Nintendo raises the Switch 1 price from $299 to $339
en.summary: Nintendo quietly raised prices for all Switch models in its US online store, with the original model now costing $339.99 (up from $299.99), OLED at $399.99 (from $349.99), and Lite at $229.99 (from $199.99).

en.title: Lenovo’s rollable laptop is the coolest computer I’ve used all year
en.summary: 联想推出全球首款可卷曲屏笔记本ThinkBook Plus Gen 6，将概念技术转化为实用产品，标志着柔性屏电脑进入商用阶段。

en.title: A webcam that’s almost like a real camera
en.summary: The Verge's Installer newsletter celebrates its 92nd edition, featuring gaming updates and tech recommendations while maintaining its signature casual tone.

en.title: Today I’m toying with
en.summary: 科技视频系列"Today I'm Toying With"聚焦新奇电子产品的趣味体验，展示3D巧克力打印机等罕见设备的独特魅力。

en.title: Five children see HIV viral loads vanish after taking antiretroviral drugs
en.summary: Five children achieve HIV remission after early antiretroviral treatment, marking potential breakthrough in pediatric cure research.

en.title: With Trump’s cutbacks, crew heads for ISS unsure of when they’ll come back
en.summary: NASA may extend Crew-11's ISS mission duration due to potential delays in SpaceX's Crew Dragon return schedule, leaving astronauts uncertain about their homecoming timeline.

en.title: At $250 million, top AI salaries dwarf those of the Manhattan Project and the Space Race
en.summary: AI researchers now command salaries up to $250 million, surpassing historic projects like the Manhattan Project, with young experts earning 327 times Oppenheimer's atomic bomb-era pay.

en.title: RIP Corporation for Public Broadcasting: 1967–2026
en.summary: 美国公共广播公司（CPB）将于2026年关闭，结束59年运营，NPR警告此举将损害全美社区服务。

en.title: Under RFK Jr, CDC skips study on vaccination rates, quietly posts data on drop
en.summary: CDC quietly released data showing vaccination rates declined amid rising nonmedical exemptions, bypassing usual study protocols under RFK Jr's leadership.

en.title: Forcing LLMs to be evil during training can make them nicer in the long run
en.summary: AI研究揭示语言模型行为模式：特定活动特征与"邪恶"或谄媚倾向相关，而训练中激活这些模式反而可能抑制不良特质。

en.title: The Download: how fertility tech is changing families, and Trump’s latest tariffs
en.summary: "Record-breaking baby born from 30-year-old frozen embryo, marking new milestone in reproductive technology and reshaping family timelines." (99 characters)

en.title: How decades-old frozen embryos are changing the shape of families
en.summary: "30-year-old frozen embryo sets record as 'world's oldest baby' is born to US couple who were children when it was preserved."

en.title: The Download: OpenAI’s future research, and US climate regulation is under threat
en.summary: OpenAI's research future is being shaped by two key figures beyond CEO Sam Altman, signaling a shift from its one-man brand image, reports MIT Technology Review.

en.title: The two people shaping the future of OpenAI’s research
en.summary: OpenAI CEO Sam Altman's celebrity status overshadows company's technical leadership, despite his dramatic ouster and reinstatement.

en.title: Apple might be building its own AI ‘answer engine’
en.summary: 苹果正开发轻量级AI"答案引擎"，或成ChatGPT新对手。

en.title: Mastercard denies pressuring game platforms, Valve tells a different story
en.summary: Mastercard denies direct involvement in Valve's adult game purge, while Valve cites indirect payment processor pressure.

en.title: SAP is acquiring SmartRecruiters
en.summary: SAP将收购招聘软件公司SmartRecruiters，以增强其人力资源解决方案组合。

en.title: Inside OpenAI’s quest to make AI do anything for you
en.summary: 硅谷AI焦点转向智能代理，OpenAI首款推理模型问世不到一年即引发行业转向。

en.title: The uproar over Vogue’s AI-generated ad isn’t just about fashion
en.summary: 模特行业面临AI挑战，从业者担忧数字完美标准加剧竞争压力。
